title: datalad push fails to push data on first try to Gin
body:
Discovered in a hacking session with @lnnrtwttkhn:
A ``datalad push`` does not push data on first attempt to a Gin remote, ``datalad publish`` does, though.

```
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp
❱ datalad create myds          
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/myds 
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time) 
create(ok): /tmp/myds (dataset)
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp
❱ cd myds
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/myds on git:master
❱ echo 123456 > README 
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/myds on git:master
❱ datalad save -m "annex README"
add(ok): README (file)                                                                                                             
save(ok): . (dataset)                                                           
action summary:                                                                 
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/myds on git:master
❱ datalad siblings add -s gin --url git@gin.g-node.org:/adswa/annexreadme.git
[INFO   ] Could not enable annex remote gin. This is expected if gin is a pure Git remote, or happens if it is not accessible. 
[WARNING] Could not detect whether gin carries an annex. If gin is a pure Git remote, this is expected.  
.: gin(-) [git@gin.g-node.org:/adswa/annexreadme.git (git)]
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/myds on git:master
# first attempt: No data is pushed
❱ datalad push --to gin
publish(ok): . (dataset) [refs/heads/master->gin:refs/heads/master [new branch]]
publish(ok): . (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->gin:refs/heads/git-annex [new branch]]
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/myds on git:master
# second attempt: Now data is pushed
❱ datalad push --to gin
copy(ok): README (file) [to gin...]                                             
copy(ok): README.md (file) [to gin...]                                          
publish(ok): . (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->gin:refs/heads/git-annex a26a676..5837d48]              
```

Now with publish:

```
❱datalad create anothertest
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/anothertest 
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time) 
create(ok): /tmp/anothertest (dataset)
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp
❱ cd anothertest
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/anothertest on git:master
❱ echo 12345634 > README
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/anothertest on git:master
❱ datalad save -m "annex README"
add(ok): README (file)                                                          
save(ok): . (dataset)                                                           
action summary:                                                                 
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/anothertest on git:master
❱ datalad siblings add -s gin --url git@gin.g-node.org:/adswa/testpublish.git
[INFO   ] Could not enable annex remote gin. This is expected if gin is a pure Git remote, or happens if it is not accessible. 
[WARNING] Could not detect whether gin carries an annex. If gin is a pure Git remote, this is expected.  
.: gin(-) [git@gin.g-node.org:/adswa/testpublish.git (git)]
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/anothertest on git:master
❱ datalad publish --to gin --transfer-data all
[INFO   ] Publishing Dataset(/tmp/anothertest) data to gin 
publish(ok): README (file)                                                      
[INFO   ] Publishing Dataset(/tmp/anothertest) to gin 
publish(ok): . (dataset) [pushed to gin: ['e80edf5..91638bb', '[new branch]']]  
action summary:
  publish (ok: 2)
```
